skills.name: Protective Camouflage
skills.description:
Increases the ATK of all Buggy Cams by +60% and grants them Camouflaged (will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks when not blocking, but can still take Splash damage)
Unlimited duration

skills.name: Panoramic Overload
skills.description:
Immediately obtains 1 Buggy Cam and grants all deployed Buggy Cams increased Detection Range, ATK +130%, DEF +130%, and RES +20
After the skill ends, all Buggy Cams are stunned for 5 seconds

talents.name: Camera Squad
talents.description: Can summon 5 Buggy Cams; Buggy Cams will reveal Invisible enemies within the surrounding 8 tiles
